me.jobTitle: Angular Specialist - Frontend and Web Developer
me.description: From concept to code, revolutionize your web presence with Angular mastery. I break down complex user experience problems to create integrity focussed solutions.

educations.school: Truba Collage of Science and Technology

certifications.title: Frontend Developer Certification (React)
certifications.description: This certification signifies my advanced proficiency as a Frontend Developer, showcasing expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React and Angular.

certifications.title: Angular Certification
certifications.description: Proud to have HackerRank Certification in Angular, a validation of my dedication to mastering Angular and delivering innovative solutions that meet the demands of modern web development.

certifications.title: JavaScript Certification
certifications.description: The HackerRank Skill Certification in JavaScript is a testament to my commitment to excellence and my passion for mastering JavaScript to create innovative and impactful web solutions.

achievements.title: Appreciation Award: March 2023
achievements.description: Honored to receive recognition for my dedication and contributions. This award underscores my commitment to excellence and teamwork, driving me to continue delivering impactful results.

achievements.title: Contributing to Flatpickr
achievements.description: Engaged with Flatpickr by submitting a PR, providing a hands-on experience in open-source collaboration, currently awaiting acceptance. This PR aimed to enhance the functionality and user experience of the library.
